name: Bind

name: AddWindow

name: InWindow

name: newKeypadSameIdentity

name: newNoDelaySameIdentity
typ: (on : Bool) -> (w : Window) -> identifier w = identifier (setNoDelay on w)

name: Active
typ: (0 _ : InputState) -> (0 windows : List Window) -> (0 _ : (w : Window ** Elem w windows)) -> (0 _ : List String) -> CursesState

name: bumpWindow
typ: (w : Window ** Elem w ws) -> (w : Window ** Elem w (y :: ws))

name: swapKeypad
typ: Bool -> (ws : List Window) -> Elem y ws -> List Window

name: swapKeypadPrf
typ: (on : Bool) -> (ws : List Window) -> (e : Elem y ws) -> Elem (setKeypad on y) (swapKeypad on ws e)

name: swapNoDelay
typ: Bool -> (ws : List Window) -> Elem y ws -> List Window

name: swapNoDelayPrf
typ: (on : Bool) -> (ws : List Window) -> (e : Elem y ws) -> Elem (setNoDelay on y) (swapNoDelay on ws e)

name: replaceWindow

name: ItHasColor

name: Named

name: MkBorder

name: There
typ: IdentifiesWindow name windows -> IdentifiesWindow name (w :: windows)

name: elemWindowIdentifies
typ: Elem (MkWindow name {_:5240} {_:5239}) ws -> IdentifiesWindow name ws

name: ItHasWindow
typ: IdentifiesWindow name ws => HasWindow name (Active {_:5297} ws {_:5296} {_:5295})

name: moreWindowsHasWindow
typ: HasWindow name (Active i xs (MkWindow name k d ** x) c) => HasWindow name (Active i (y :: xs) (MkWindow name k d ** There x) c)

name: lookupWindow
typ: (name : String) -> (ws : List Window) -> IdentifiesWindow name ws => Window

name: lookupFindsIdentifier
typ: {auto {conArg:5438} : IdentifiesWindow w ws} -> lookupWindow w ws .identifier = w

name: lookupWindowPrf
typ: (name : String) -> (ws : List Window) -> {auto {conArg:5479} : IdentifiesWindow name ws} -> Elem (lookupWindow name ws) ws

name: setWindow
typ: (s : CursesState) -> (name : String) -> HasWindow name s => CursesState

name: initColorPair
